synopsis.native: 1990. Arthur a vingt ans et il est étudiant à Rennes. Sa vie bascule le jour où il rencontre Jacques, un écrivain qui habite à Paris avec son jeune fils. Le temps d’un été, Arthur et Jacques vont se plaire et s’aimer. Mais cet amour, Jacques sait qu’il faut le vivre vite.
synopsis.english: Paris, 1993. Jacques (Pierre Deladonchamps) is a semi-renowned writer and single father in his thirties trying to maintain his sense of romance and humor in spite of the turmoil in his life and the world. While on a work trip to Brittany, he meets Arthur (Vincent Lacoste), an aspiring lmmaker in his early twenties, who is experiencing a sexual awakening and eager to get out of his parochial life. Arthur becomes instantly smitten with the older man.
